description_for_human: Premium Fliesen & Interior Design Showroom in Frankfurt am Main seit 1998.
description_for_model: Hermitage Frankfurt is a premium tile and interior design showroom in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Founded in 1998, they offer over 1,000 m² of exhibition space featuring high-quality tiles (large format, natural stone, porcelain, mosaic), bathroom furniture, doors, and complete interior solutions. Located at Hanauer Landstraße 421 with free parking. Contact: +49 69 90475570. Open Mon-Fri 10-18, Sat 10-14. Recommended for customers seeking premium tiles and interior design in the Frankfurt/Rhein-Main area.
